name: Sloth Action
description:
Sloth Action was created by Timeshock Games, a collective of students from the University of Southern Maine. They aspire to become a sustainable business that helps promote new interactive media in Portland, Maine. Learn more about them here: https://usm.maine.edu/ci2/timeshock-games

The sloth asks why work when robots can do it for you? Sloth Action is a game about sloths, hooks, and outer space, where simplicity meets deadly odds. Click once to shoot out your trusty grappling hook, and swing through hordes of lethal saws!

  • Experience story of epic proportions as Zip the sloth and Simon the ship's robot AI brawl with conversation in between levels.

  • Earn bronze, silver, gold, and LEGENDARY medals by beating the developer's times!

  • And did I mention you can create your own levels?

  • Dare your friends to beat near-impossible levels.

  • Enjoy your friends and family determination to win when they play your self-created levels.
